title: Experience Khajuraho’s Most Luxurious Hotel with Daily Breakfast and a Nightly Drink
description: Escapes Club invites you to discover the rich history of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Khajuraho temples, staying at the award-winning hotel, The LaLiT Temple View Khajuraho, one of the area’s most luxurious hotels, located less than 15 minutes from Khajuraho Airport. Stay in pure luxury and enjoy daily breakfast, one romantic dinner, one drink per person per night and a 30-minute massage per person.
offer_address: Opposite Circuit House, Sevagram, Khajuraho, Madhya Pradesh 471606, India
